scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run local-services" "npm run launch" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && nix flake check -L && npm test -w tests
scripts.launch: echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/profiles-test.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zome && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:setup && storybook build && gh-pages -d ./storybook-static -b gh-pages
scripts.docs:setup: npm run build -w @holochain-open-dev/profiles && npm run analyze -w @holochain-open-dev/profiles
